titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Nancy Gendell papers

archdesc.bioghist: Ann Arbor, Michigan, member of the Women Strike for Peace, speaker at the Ann Arbor-based Inter-University Committee for a Public Hearing on Viet Nam.
archdesc.scopecontent: Reports of meetings and audio tapes of conference speakers.
